name: Any Size Any Yarn Garter Square
description: This is a simple garter stitch square knit on the diagonal -- it can be worked in any yarn, at any gauge, to any size you need. It’s designed to be a square component for a blanket or afghan, but could just as easily be a simple dishcloth or washcloth. Or a large square blanket -- the possibilities are endless!
suggested_yarn: Any gauge - designed for any gauge ?
full_text: This is a simple garter stitch square knit on the diagonal -- it can be worked in any yarn, at any gauge, to any size you need. It’s designed to be a square component for a blanket or afghan, but could just as easily be a simple dishcloth or washcloth. Or a large square blanket -- the possibilities are endless!
